definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Toggles popup information window for the pointed entry in the playlist.
sentences.chinese: 切換播放列表中鼠標指向的項的彈出信息窗口。

sentences.english: Finally, we were able to view, enjoy, and share our playlist page.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們能夠查看或共享自己的播放列表頁面。

sentences.english: Whether to show the toolbar in the playlist window.
sentences.chinese: 是否要在播放列表窗口顯示工具欄。

sentences.english: We could create a playlist using a separate page.
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠從一個獨立頁面創建播放列表。

sentences.english: However, you can add a cover art image to each playlist.
sentences.chinese: 還有，你可以爲每個播放列表創建一個封面。

sentences.english: The New Taliban™ is all about playlists.
sentences.chinese: 這些東西都在新款塔利班的播放列表裏。

sentences.english: The more interesting thing to me is who is going to control the playlist.
sentences.chinese: 對我而言更有趣的是誰來控制播放列表。

sentences.english: I can even subscribe to his playlists.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至可以訂閱他的播放列表。

sentences.english: Also works with a number of different playlist formats including XML.
sentences.chinese: 並可播放如XML在內的播放列表格式。

sentences.english: Allows users to maintain play lists as well.
sentences.chinese: 它允許用戶保存播放列表。

definition: sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
